mapper.insert: insert into post (postId, nickName, title, status, productsPrice, hitCount, contents, created, deadLine, chooseFile, postLikeCount, recruitment, type, categoryId, myAddr, userId, likeDate) values (#{postId}, #{nickName}, #{title}, #{status}, #{productsPrice}, 0, #{contents}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp, #{chooseFile}, 0, #{recruitment}, #{type}, #{categoryId}, #{myAddr}, #{userId}, current_timestamp)
mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select postId,nickName,title,status,productsPrice,hitCount, contents,to_char(created,'YYYY-MM-DD'),to_char(deadLine,'YYYY-MM-DD'), chooseFile,postLikeCount,recruitment,type, categoryId,myAddr,userId,to_char(likeDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') from post order by postId desc) data)
where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
mapper.update: update post set hitCount=hitCount+1 where postId=#{postId}
update post set chooseFile=#{chooseFile} where postId=#{postId}
update post set chooseFile='lion.png' where postId=#{postId}
